body:
@NIsTocks21
All humans are inherently evil. You have the Christian zeitgeist to thank for your sense of morality. In the coming years, you will feel more and more out of place as that zeitgeist fades, until you are surrounded by nothing more than murderous degenerates, including, if you’re unlucky, your own children.

Woahhhh I have all 8 stories open on different tabs just because of the name and the cover. I just know this was gonna be good and she's an alien!! It's been so long since I've found something like this 😭
Dude stfu stop trying to be philosophical in a hentai website comment section

Her deep, dark eyes, her gentle expressions, her unintrusive, supernatural powers. I'm in love... It's not an unfamiliar feeling, however. I've felt this before, when I just got past my first decade of life. But today, I feel like I'm a movie villain fascinated and enticed by a powerful being no one should possess... Am I inherently evil? Or does everyone feel the same tendencies?
Anyone reading this, get ready for a story so good it probably should've been in a serialized manga and not a hentai doujin series.
He DID pee all over her, so does the urination tag technically apply here?

That was cute~~
Huge erotic factor imo
Way to be be a spoiling dick, Hanferd.
I busted one of the biggest nuts I’ve had in a while to this
Spoiler, the very last chapter, we see Earth Destroyed after WW3 and this Alien girl actually been collecting all human DNA to create a new peaceful future.
